line_1: Again disturb'd, when Giles with wearying strides
line_2: From ridge to ridge the ponderous harrow guides;

line_1: Some Packhorse for a Pegasus he strides,
line_2: And stumbles on Preferment as he rides.

line_1: The tuck'd-up Sempstress walks with hasty Strides,
line_2: While Streams run down her oil'd Umbrella's Sides.
